issue.title: [Python] Python fs documentation out of date with code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9840](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9840). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The python documentation has an example of using the filesystem interface. It references the FileStats object that was removed in favor of FileInfo. The method name in the example was changed also.
